location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: This map with text in French depicts railways in Asia Minor. It also indicates hydrology, and settlement and provides indication of relief of the Montagnes du Taurus [Taurus Mountains] by use of hachures. The map features an explanatory note in French as well as Roman numerals to number the different sections of the proposed Baghdad Railway with a terminus at Koweit [Kuwait].In addition to the black and white symbols are additional lines, drawn in red and blue ink.A reference key states:'Smyrna-Aidan railway is coloured Red. the Smyrna-Cassaba railway " " [ is coloured] Blue.'
